main event: A round, ball-shaped object was observed streaking across the sky at Tinker AFB, Oklahoma on May 16, 1955.
interesting points: The object was yellow-red in color with blue streaks behind it.
The object was observed for 1-2 seconds and was estimated to be 35 inches in diameter.
The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 1,000-1,500 mph at an altitude of 3,000 feet.
The object disappeared as if it
The report suggests the object was possibly a meteor.
sighted object: Round, ball-shaped object with yellow, red, and blue streaks
